DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate prognosis coronary stenosis base intracoronary Imaging .
DOC.brief_title: Prognosis Coronary Stenosis Based Intracoronary Imaging ; A Multicenter , Prospective Observational Study
DOC.criteria: Patients intracoronary image Written consent Severe calcification and/or severe tortuosity Lesion previous bypass graft surgery ( CABG ) Left ventricular ejection fraction le 30 % Coronary spasm Life expectancy le 2 year Pregnancy breastfeeding
